prompts: Create a legendary Pokemon that has sleek, aerodynamic features and vibrant colors.
Generate a Pokemon with dual flying and psychic abilities, designed with elegant curves and unique patterns.
Show me a mystical creature inspired by Latias, featuring a blend of pink and white colors.
Imagine a Pokemon that can soar through the skies gracefully, with a design that emphasizes speed and agility.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of flight and psychic powers, with a futuristic look.
Give me a Pokemon that has a serene expression, radiating calmness and mystery, adorned in soft hues.
Make a character based on Latias that can blend seamlessly into its forest habitat, showcasing natural colors.

distinctive_features: Prominent wings with a unique shape
Distinctive red and white color pattern
Elegant facial features resembling a dragon
